title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 305.1 - Authority to nominate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 305.1 - Authority to nominate

State Regulations

On and after April 1, 1957, any member may nominate, on a
form prescribed by the Comptroller, in addition to the named primary
beneficiary, one named contingent beneficiary to whom the benefits provided by
sections
51
and
60
of the Retirement and Social Security Law
will be paid in the event the primary beneficiary does not survive the
member. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
305.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
